original_text: When Moses came down from Mount Sinai, with the two tablets of the testimony in his hand as he came down from the mountain, Moses did not know that the skin of his face shone because he had been talking with God.
korean_text: 모세가 그 증거의 두 판을 모세의 손에 들고 시내 산에서 내려오니 그 산에서 내려올 때에 모세는 자기가 여호와와 말하였음으로 말미암아 얼굴 피부에 광채가 나나 깨닫지 못하였더라

sentences.original_text: When Moses came down from Mount Sinai
with the two tablets of the testimony in his hand
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 손에 증거의 두 판을 들고

sentences.original_text: as he came down from the mountain
that the skin of his face shone
because he had been talking with God
